page.title: 07INDUSTRY.
page.content: Since 1885 AILSA SHIPBUILDING CO. LTD.have been building vessels of all types at TROON.Situated on the FIRTH of CLYDE the shipyard is easily accessible and pleasantly situated.Being so far down the Firth, the two graving docks of 289feet and 400feet lengths are in constant demand by sea/going and coasting type vessels.Facilities are available for lifting weights up to 50 tons.There are 3 building berths.The fine tradition of craftmanship established over 70 years is much in evidence.In the plating sheds and outfitting shops parts of the vessels are pre/fabricated by modern means ready for erection on the building berth and fitting into the vessel after launching.More about the AILSA SHIPYARD in a later text.
